newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: S.Korean troops seek North Korean infiltrators.
newsitem.headline: S.Korean troops seek North Korean infiltrators.

text.p: South Korean troops and helicopters launched a hunt on Wednesday for suspected North Korean infiltrators after an abandoned boat was found on the east coast, state television reported.
It said authorities suspected five or six North Koreans infiltrated into the south during the early hours of Wednesday.
The television said the boat was found grounded near a beach close to the the border with North Korea.
Witnesses were quoted as saying they had seen five or six men dressed in military uniforms heading inland.
South Korean troops have set up checkpoints along all roads in the area.
North and South Korea have been technically at war since their 1950-53 conflict ended in a truce.
